divs: Sighting DetailsWe just looked at these pictures last night and saw this object. We diden't see it while it was in the field. This was taken in South Park Colorado. we were taking pictures of the rainbow and noticed this object at a later date while viewing our trip photos. I attached a few other photos taken at the same time with only the mountains and rainbow. My e-mail address is crestone777@netzero.net
